long_description: The Powertraveller Solargorilla solar battery charger captures free and limitless power from the sun to recharge phones, music players, handheld game consoles and some laptops wherever you may roam! 5-volt USB output draws power from 2 photovoltaic solar panels that are housed in a tough and water-resistant folding case; red LED indicates the strength of the charge. Male tips: L01D 4.75 x 1.7mm, L51D 5.5 x 1.7mm, L52D 5.5 x 2.1mm, L53D 5.5 x 2.5mm, L54D 6.5 x 4.5mm, L55D 6.3 x 3.0mm, L57D 3P-HRS-A, L61D 7.4 x 0.65mm and L73D 5.5 x 3.3mm. Mobile device tips include DC2.0 (mini Nokia), micro USB, mini USB, Samsung G600, LG Chocolate, Sony Ericsson (wide), DC4.0 for Sony PSP and Nintendo DS Lite. iPhone(R) 5 can be charged with a USB adapter (not included; available for purchase from Apple). The Powertraveller Solargorilla solar battery charger features a compact, folding design that is ideal for travel and storage.
short_description: The Powertraveller Solargorilla solar battery charger captures free and limitless power from the sun to recharge phones, music players, handheld game consoles and some laptops wherever you may roam!
